description.displayText: Vanessa is an extremely responsible, terrific caretaker.  She worked for me for daily, for months, in a somewhat intense situation.  I have two boys with special needs, including the older one having ADHD, and she was great with them.  She was able to be authoritative when necessary but also playful and engaging.  Vanessa seems to understand and move among those attributes intuitively.  In fact I think she was even BETTER with my older one than with the younger one -- I think because her ability to work with the more immediate challenges was more engaging than my younger son's more sedate needs.  Additionally, she is absolutely responsible and trustworthy.  She was never late.  And I never once even considered the security of my things with her around.  You shouldn't pass her up.  If I needed someone again, I wouldn't.

description.displayText: Vanessa worked as a nanny for my three boys. They were 7, 9 and 13 years old when she started.  Vanessa helped kids with homework, drove them to multiple activities, helped me with some house work.  She also tutored my kids in Spanish.  Vanessa was able to adjust quickly to multiple changes in kids activities every week.  She is very reliable, fun to be around, good driver and a nice person overall.

description.displayText: She was amazing with my newborn. She had many creative tricks for putting a fussy baby to sleep unfortunately due to no work I could not keep her but I would recommend highly to any mother who needs a great nanny. She is amazing with newborns and children.
